messages.message:
just wonder, have anyone see this issue before  `Missing "Authorization" in headers.`? I can log in localhost. however, all the request return with this error..

Full error logs.
```[2022-08-02 19:04:38,374] [MainProcess/ThreadPoolExecutor-0_3] {/instabase-api-server-apps/py/instabase/utils/web/handler_util.py:108} ERROR - Received exception in WEBAPP JSON request: Error=missing_authorization: Missing "Authorization" in headers.. Traceback=Traceback (most recent call last):;File "/instabase-api-server-apps/py/instabase/utils/web/handler_util.py", line 102, in inner_func;return f(*args, **kwargs);File "/instabase-api-server-apps/py/instabase/utils/oauth2/oauth2.py", line 158, in wrapped_f;oauth2.validate_request(oauth2_scopes, request);File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/authlib/oauth2/rfc6749/resource_protector.py", line 136, in validate_request;validator, token_string = self.parse_request_authorization(request);File "/home/ibuser/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/authlib/oauth2/rfc6749/resource_protector.py", line 123, in parse_request_authorization;raise MissingAuthorizationError(self._default_auth_type, self._default_realm);authlib.oauth2.rfc6749.errors.MissingAuthorizationError: missing_authorization: Missing "Authorization" in headers.;```
You may need to upgrade your python libraries from this change by @Shubham Oli https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1659330596829979
humm going to try and restart all my server
